Available for rent is a Luxury 1 bedroom apartment- Hardwood floors and stainless steel appliances- High ceilings and large windows for lots of light exposure- Spacious living room and bedroom for king size bed and lots of furniture- Amenities include furnished lobby with fireplace, laundry room, fitness center with a Jacuzzi, furnished roof top deck with barbecue grill and parking available for drivers. 1 stop away from Midtown Manhattan on N or W train 7 train is also available and will take you to 42nd st midtown in 1 stop Many grocery stores, shopping centers, restaurants, lounges and much much more nearby.

For viewings contact Shah at 646-717-1832 or email at [email protected]
